content: I understand that you're trying to help me with my abdominal pain and discomfort, but I think I need to clarify some things. I've had this issue since mid-February, and I've already seen a doctor about it. They suspect that I might have a gallbladder issue, and I'm actually scheduled for surgery to remove my gallbladder soon. I just want to make sure I'm doing everything I can to prepare for the surgery and recover well afterward.
